Title: A Locked Room

North Side.Body: This side of the room has a bunch of file cabinets.  You see the vent you fell out of - it's lucky you didn't hit your head on any corners.

Search.Text: Between some file cabinets, you find a scrap of paper with the word 'Fahre-' written on it.

Search.Text: Looking around, you manage to find a key behind some boxes.

Escape.Body:
You exit the room to find yourself in a long hallway.
Just what have you gotten yourself into this time?
